prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a serene expression and flowing, colorful features.
Show me a mythical creature that glows softly in the moonlight and has elegant wings.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies dreams and has a unique, celestial appearance.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like it belongs in a mystical forest with vibrant colors.
Make a design for a powerful psychic being that has a calming presence and graceful movements.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a guardian of dreams with an ethereal design and pastel colors.
Design a legendary Pokemon that floats gracefully and has a soothing, tranquil aura.

distinctive_features: Spherical body with an elongated neck
